modules.description: Provides functions to log messages at different severity levels, including info, warning, error, and debug. It works with strings and custom log levels defined by the user. Used to track application flow, debug issues, and capture errors in real-time during development and production.

The module provides level-based logging operations, enabling conversion and manipulation of log levels (Debug, Info, Warn, Error, Fatal) and configuring output behaviors like timezone, color formatting, and level filtering. It works with custom types such as `level`, `timezone`, and `color`, offering functionality to track log counts, manage statistics, and adjust appearance settings. Use cases include application debugging, real-time log monitoring, and ensuring consistent log formatting across environments.
